players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Be cautious, Bob. Your silence might be suspicious to the detective."
Bob: "I will investigate Charlie next. I believe he might be the mafioso."
Charlie: "I will keep my silence tonight. I don't want to give away any information."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
